name: iPaint - Color By Number Game
description:
Painting must be one of the best relaxing ways.

iPaint is an art drawing game to color modern artworks with coloring by numbers.A number coloring book and coloring puzzle game for everyone.
iPaint upgrades the traditional coloring book app to bring a more modern work. Every picture is marked by numbers, paint your favorite coloring pages by following the numbers. Enjoying this stress-free painting art game, which is also a very good choice for children's imagination and creativity.

Key Features
- Convenient and fast: Open iPaint anytime, anywhere, color by number without pen and paper, finish your artwork easily!
- Massive themes: Cute animals, characters, beautiful flowers, stunning places and many more different themes.
- Daily updates: Every day there are various unique images and new coloring pages waiting for you to discover.
- Reminder Tools: Enjoy the simplicity and ease of painting by numbers and app use, use hints to find tiny hard-to-find cells.
- Show your artworks: Post number coloring artworks on all social networks and share with friends and families.

Rediscover the fun and relaxation of color together. Simpler operation, more happiness. Focus on your own feelings and use this digital coloring book for marvelous artistic creation! Choose from a wide variety of paintings, join us now to build your own world of color and beauty!
